title: Blog of the day
body:
As seen on my MY.YAHOO.COM page:



Pretty cool, eh?
author: Dan

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Pets on Crack is horribly misleading.

comments.author: Jon J
comments.body:
I have a question:

Why did you change your RSS feed so that only the headlines appear? I was rather fond of this blog appearing on my friends page via LJ.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Jon J: The old RSS feed was provided by blogger, which I no longer use. I built this blog by hand so I could make it exactly how I wanted. In short, I dropped the full-text RSS because it was creating an unneeded server burden AND I like forcing people to come to my blog to read it... they leave more comments that way.

comments.author: Aaron
comments.body: You just can't get enough attention, can you?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I'm a media whore, aren't I?
